data.text:
Hehe, it's gotten quite late, hasn't it. If we 
don't head home soon we'll miss our curfews.
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
<story>Hehe, it's gotten quite late, hasn't it. If we 
<story>don't head home soon we'll miss our curfews.

data.name: Rice & Tamamo
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: Why don't we head home then?
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed: <story>Why don't we head home then?

data.text: Y-Yeah…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Y-Yeah…

data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: Hehe, Rob Roy-chan seems all tuckered out from today.
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed: <story>Hehe, Rob Roy-chan seems all tuckered out from today.

data.text: Seems like she's got a bunch on her mind.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Seems like she's got a bunch on her mind.

data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
Hey, Bourbon-chan. What do you plan 
on doing when we get back home?
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
<story>Hey, Bourbon-chan. What do you plan 
<story>on doing when we get back home?

data.text:
I will re-examine my plan for the Halloween party with the data 
that was obtained today. My tasks have also not been completed 
yet, so I plan to execute those as well.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I will re-examine my plan for the Halloween party with the data 
<story>that was obtained today. My tasks have also not been completed 
<story>yet, so I plan to execute those as well.

data.text: ! By yourself…?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>! By yourself…?

data.text: Yes… After all, these are my tasks.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Yes… After all, these are my tasks.

data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: Okay everyone, get a great night's sleep.
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed: <story>Okay everyone, get a great night's sleep.

data.text: Good… night…
data.name: Rice & Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Good… night…

data.text:
Ah, Bourbon-san! A-About the decorations for tomorrow's party. We 
actually managed to finish our portion today!
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>Ah, Bourbon-san! A-About the decorations for tomorrow's party. We 
<story>actually managed to finish our portion today!

data.text:
You've been working super hard through the night 
haven't you? That's why we were wondering if 
we could help you out with anything…
data.name: Horsegirl B
data.processed:
<story>You've been working super hard through the night 
<story>haven't you? That's why we were wondering if 
<story>we could help you out with anything…

data.text:
No, I am fine. You girls should take a break instead. Since these 
are my tasks they should be done alone.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>No, I am fine. You girls should take a break instead. Since these 
<story>are my tasks they should be done alone.

data.text: I see… But you know…
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed: <story>I see… But you know…

data.text:
Bourbon-san, I know for a fact that you can do it. But you really 
shouldn't push yourself too hard. Let's all work together to 
make sure this party is a success!
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>Bourbon-san, I know for a fact that you can do it. But you really 
<story>shouldn't push yourself too hard. Let's all work together to 
<story>make sure this party is a success!

data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
To put it simply, escaping from this haunted 
house is a mission for all of us, right…?
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
<story>To put it simply, escaping from this haunted 
<story>house is a mission for all of us, right…?

data.text:
I have already decided that these are my tasks. 
Therefore, they must be completed alone.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I have already decided that these are my tasks. 
<story>Therefore, they must be completed alone.

data.text:
However… the main objective of this mission is to have a great 
joint dormitory Halloween party…
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>However… the main objective of this mission is to have a great 
<story>joint dormitory Halloween party…

data.text: But at this stage…
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>But at this stage…

data.text:
Even if I think I will be annoying… Even if I think it will be 
scary… What Rob Roy-san did for me…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>Even if I think I will be annoying… Even if I think it will be 
<story>scary… What Rob Roy-san did for me…

data.text: With the power… of a persona…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>With the power… of a persona…

data.text: I'm sorry, but please…!!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>I'm sorry, but please…!!

data.text:
Huh, Rice!? It's almost lights out, ya know!? 
You should get back to the Miho Dorms.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Huh, Rice!? It's almost lights out, ya know!? 
<story>You should get back to the Miho Dorms.

data.text: B-Bu-But! Umm, err… W-Well…!!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>B-Bu-But! Umm, err… W-Well…!!

data.text:
P-Please help me create a persona and costume!! 
I need it now, or else Bourbon-san will…!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>P-Please help me create a persona and costume!! 
<story>I need it now, or else Bourbon-san will…!

data.text: Bourbon-san will…!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Bourbon-san will…!

data.text: … Rice…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>… Rice…

data.text:
Guess I got no choice. I'll call over Fuji 
and Hishiama. We'll meet up in yer room.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Guess I got no choice. I'll call over Fuji 
<story>and Hishiama. We'll meet up in yer room.

data.text: Wait nah… You had the courage to come all the way here.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Wait nah… You had the courage to come all the way here.

data.text:
Rice, you really are a great kid, ya know? 
Anyways, just wait here for a bit, kay?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Rice, you really are a great kid, ya know? 
<story>Anyways, just wait here for a bit, kay?

data.text:
… I have confirmed that Flower-san is 
asleep. Now I must get to work.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>… I have confirmed that Flower-san is 
<story>asleep. Now I must get to work.

data.text:
Remaining work… Create a proposal for the party 
and create the decorations that are left. First, 
I must make an incision in the fabric…
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Remaining work… Create a proposal for the party 
<story>and create the decorations that are left. First, 
<story>I must make an incision in the fabric…

data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>!?

data.text: Welcome to the land of night… I-I am a vampire…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Welcome to the land of night… I-I am a vampire…

data.text: You will become… one of my followers…!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>You will become… one of my followers…!
